007package imagingbook.violajones.lib;
008
009import java.awt.Rectangle;
010
011/** 
012 * Represents a rectangle, along with a weight. 
013 */
014public class FeaturePatch extends Rectangle {
015        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
016        
017        public final double weight;
018
019        FeaturePatch(int x, int y, int w, int h, double weight) {
020                super(x, y, w, h);
021                this.weight = weight;
022        }
023
024        static FeaturePatch fromString(String text) {
025                String[] tab = text.split(" ");
026                FeaturePatch fp = null;
027                try {
028                        int x = java.lang.Integer.parseInt(tab[0]);
029                        int y = java.lang.Integer.parseInt(tab[1]);
030                        int w = java.lang.Integer.parseInt(tab[2]);
031                        int h = java.lang.Integer.parseInt(tab[3]);
032                        double weight = java.lang.Double.parseDouble(tab[4]);
033                        fp = new FeaturePatch(x, y, w, h, weight);
034                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
035                        System.out.println(FeaturePatch.class.getSimpleName() + ": NumberFormatException");
036                }
037                return fp;
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public String toString() {
042                return String.format("x=%d y=%d w=%d h=%d weight=%.2f", 
043                                this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height, this.weight);
044        }
045}
